title: Can we please have that the right way round? (TEFC)
brief_description: Features John Cleese and James Cossins preparing a slide presentation and looking back at a series of past disasters. It contains the basic rules of slide presentation and operation in a form designed to stop anyone who sees it from ever making the classic mistakes again. Writer: Dennis Nordern.
